attributes.action: stop denying that he dyes his hair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair has been dyeing his hair for the last 10 years and we ask him to tell the truth for once and admit that he dyes his hair. He should be proud to be going grey! It got noticeably greyer during the WMD fiasco,and since then he has dyed it fairer continuosly. We believe our prime minister should set an example and embrace his true hair colour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
